Generation VI.X: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can't see anything.
Generation VI.Y: Its four horns are a high-performance radar system. It uses them to sense sounds and smells, rather than using ears or a nose.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can't see anything.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Its four horns are a high-performance radar system. It uses them to sense sounds and smells, rather than using ears or a nose.

Generation VII.Sun: It has trouble drawing a line between friends and food. It will calmly try to melt and eat even those it gets along well with.
Generation VII.Moon: This Pokémon's mucous can dissolve anything. Toothless, it sprays mucous on its prey. Once they're nicely dissolved, it slurps them up.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It crawls along sluggishly. The swirly protrusion on its back is filled with its brain and other organs.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Its entire body is covered with gooey mucus that can dissolve anything. Be sure to put gloves on if you're going to touch it.

Generation VIII.Sword: Although this Pokémon isn't very strong, its body is coated in a caustic slime that can melt through anything, so predators steer clear of it.
Generation VIII.Shield: The lump on its back contains its tiny brain. It thinks only of food and escaping its enemies.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: A creature given to melancholy. I suspect its metallic shell developed as a result of the mucus on its skin reacting with the iron in Hisui's water.

Generation IX.Scarlet: The swirly protrusion on its back is filled with all its vital organs, such as its brain and heart.
Generation IX.Violet: When Sliggoo senses danger, the mucus coating its entire body becomes more concentrated— it'll dissolve anything.

Generation VII.Sun: Exeggutor Island ( SOS Battle in rain )
Generation VII.Moon: Exeggutor Island ( SOS Battle in rain )
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Exeggutor Island ( SOS Battle in rain )
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Exeggutor Island ( SOS Battle in rain )

Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Crimson Mirelands : Holm of Trials , Ursa's Ring ( mass outbreaks ), massive mass outbreaks ( Hisuian Form ) Coronet Highlands : near Ancient Quarry ( Hisuian Form ) Unobtainable ( Kalosian Form )

Generation IX.Violet: West Province: Area Three ( Kalosian Form ) North Province: Casseroya Lake ( Kalosian Form ) South Province: Area Four ( Poison Tera Type ) ( Kalosian Form ) Tera Raid Battles ( 4★ ) ( Kalosian Form ) Evolve Goomy in Pokémon Legends: Arceus via Pokémon HOME ( Hisuian Form )
